Chloe And Isabel | New York, NY (Manhattan) or REMOTE

"Backed with our own jewelry brand and more than $41 million in venture funding, our engineering team is building a new ecommerce platform for social retail" Our team is about half remote, half on site in New York. We have a Rails backend, and use React and Relay on the front end.

We are looking for an experienced front end engineer - we need someone who is an expert in the details of CSS, is very solid w/ javascript (preferable React), and is excited about the idea of mentoring other engineers.
